Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement Phase 1 foundation

- Install core dependencies \(Supabase, shadcn/ui, lucide, date-fns, zod, recharts\)
- Setup shadcn/ui with button, input, card, label, select, dialog, dropdown-menu, tabs, sonner, form, table, badge components
- Configure Supabase client \(browser, server, middleware\)
- Create database schema with 12 tables \(profiles, suppliers, wig_makers, categories, batches, products, productions, customers, sales, sale_items, exchange_rates, settings\)
- Setup RLS policies for owner/staff access control
- Create auth triggers for new user handling and auto-timestamps
- Implement dashboard layout with responsive sidebar, header, and mobile nav
- Add login and signup pages with Supabase Auth

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement Phase 3 - Sales & Production

Sales Module:
- Sales list with filtering by date
- POS-style new sale form with cart functionality
- Product selection with stock checking
- Customer selection \(optional walk-in\)
- Payment method and sales channel selection
- Discount support
- Automatic stock reduction on sale
- Sale detail view with itemized receipt

Production Module:
- Production orders list with status tabs
- Stats cards \(pending, in progress, completed\)
- Create/edit production orders
- Assign wig makers to orders
- Status tracking \(pending -> in_progress -> completed\)
- Timeline tracking \(start, expected, actual completion\)
- Auto-increment stock when production completed

Bug Fix:
- Fixed auth trigger to use proper schema qualification

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
